goal.tools.mc.core

Class Directives

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.core.Directives

  • public class Directives
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a set of directives that can be passed to the model checker, e.g. to signal that slicing should be turned on.
    Author:
    sungshik

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean EXPLICIT_GC
      Indicates whether the garbage collector should be called each time before successors are generated during exploration (typical use is for benchmarking; otherwise it just slows down verification for no reason).
      static boolean POR
      Indicates whether partial order reduction should be applied.
      static boolean PRINT_TREE
      Indicates whether a search tree should be printed during exploration.
      static boolean PROG_ON_THE_FLY
      Indicates whether the program automaton should be constructed on-the-fly or before exploration commences.
      static boolean PROP_ON_THE_FLY
      Indicates whether the property automaton should be constructed on-the-fly or before exploration commences.
      static boolean SLICING
      Indicates whether slicing should be applied.

    • Field Detail

      • EXPLICIT_GC

        public static boolean EXPLICIT_GC
        Indicates whether the garbage collector should be called each time before successors are generated during exploration (typical use is for benchmarking; otherwise it just slows down verification for no reason). Default is false.

      • POR

        public static boolean POR
        Indicates whether partial order reduction should be applied. Works only for stuttering invariant properties, flat agents, and a restricted set of Prolog built-ins. Default is false.

      • PRINT_TREE

        public static boolean PRINT_TREE
        Indicates whether a search tree should be printed during exploration. Default is false.

      • PROP_ON_THE_FLY

        public static boolean PROP_ON_THE_FLY
        Indicates whether the property automaton should be constructed on-the-fly or before exploration commences. Default is true.

      • PROG_ON_THE_FLY

        public static boolean PROG_ON_THE_FLY
        Indicates whether the program automaton should be constructed on-the-fly or before exploration commences. Default is true.

      • SLICING

        public static boolean SLICING
        Indicates whether slicing should be applied. Works only for safety properties, flat agents, and a restricted set of Prolog built-ins. Default is false.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Directives

        public Directives()
